title: From The Desk Of Donald Trump
description_short: From The Desk Of Donald Trump was a video series published to the Trump Organization's YouTube channel between February 2011 and April 2013.
description_long:
From The Desk Of Donald Trump was a video series published to the Trump Organization's YouTube channel between February 2011 and April 2013. After Donald Trump won the 2016 US presidential election most of the videos were removed or made private. As of October 2021, none off the videos are available to watch on the Trump Organization's YouTube channel.

Data sources:
Donald J. Trump (facebook.com)
From The Desk Of Donald Trump (youtube.com) [Archived November 1, 2012]
From The Desk Of Donald Trump (youtube.com) [Archived March 11, 2016]
Donald Trump - Deleted Video Log (Vlog) 2011-2014 (factba.se)
YouTube channel UC9AKA0PYiGCSPqfCEMaKtag (trump) (archive.org)
Inside Trump’s Make Believe Presidential Addresses (thedailybeast.com)
Many of Trump's old videos are now unavailable on the Trump Organization's YouTube (edition.cnn.com)
